name: Paperclip Sort Simulator
description:
Team Name
IncapableProductions

You are Timo, who has to sort paperclips for his work. It's break time. Everything was fine, but suddenly...
Relaxing gameplay combined with action.

Enjoy =)

Gamepad Support:
Left Trigger: Pickup
Left/Right Face Buttons: Change distance
Right Trigger: Boost
Bottom Face Button: Jump

Did you find all easter eggs/paths?
Witcher 3
Paragon
Fortnite/Unreal Tournament/Some Typo Mesh
